repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: A palm leaf manuscript containing the Bhāgavatapurāṇa, Skandha 1-4; 6-10; 12.

msItem.title: Bhāgavatapurāṇa
msItem.incipit: janmādyasya yato 'ṃvayāditarataś cārtheṣv abhijña svarāṭ tene brahma hṛdā ya ādikavaye muhyanti yat sūrayaḥ tejovārimṛdāṃ yathā vinimayo yatra trisargo 'mṛṣā dhāṃnā svena sadā nirastakuhakaṃ satyaṃ

msItem.title: Bhāgavatapurāṇa
msItem.rubric: śrīgaṇādhipataye namaḥ | śrīsarasvatyai namaḥ | śubham astu | avighnam astu | śrīmunigurubhyo namaḥ | hariḥ oṃ |
msItem.incipit:
janmādyasya yato nvayāditarataś cārtheṣv abhijñaḥ svarāṭ tene brahma hṛdā ya ādikavaye muhyaṃ
ti yat sūrayaḥ |
msItem.explicit: m amṛtaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ dhīmahi | namas tasmai bhagavate vāsudevāya sākṣiṇe | ya idam kṛpayā kasmai vyācacakṣe mumukṣave |
msItem.finalRubric:
||—|| samāptaṃ bhāgavataṃ purāṇaṃ ||—||
yasya mūlaṃ stutiḥ sākṣān prakāṃde nigamāvaniḥ | prastuvaṃ bhagavadbhaktir apavargaphalaṃ smṛtaṃ | tasya bhāgavatāsya syād eva kalāphalodayaṃ ||—||—|| śrī śrī śrī śrī śrī śrī śubham astu —

extent.measure: 5 guard folios inserted at the beginning of the bundle, 1 folio numbered 1; ff. 1-14; 1 folio numbered 14; ff. 15-17; ff. 18-21; ff. 22-67; 1 folio numbered 68; ff. 68-76; 1 folio numbered 76; ff. 77-94; 24 blank folios inserted; ff. 119-122; 1 blank folio inserted; ff. 123-128; 1 blank folio inserted; ff. 129-153; 1 blank folio inserted; ff. 154-269; ff. 314-325.

supportDesc.foliation: Nandināgarī numerals, on the left margin of the recto, ff. 1-94, ff. 95-118 are blank, ff. 119-269, ff. 314-325. At the beginning, after the guard folios, a folio numbered 1 in Telugu script is inserted before f. 1 in Nandināgarī. 1 folio numbered 14 in Telugu script is inserted after f. 14 in Nandināgarī. 1 folio numbered 68 in Telugu script is inserted after f. 67 in Nandināgarī, hower f. 68 in Nandināgarī follows and contains the same text. 2 consecutive folios are numbered 76 in Nandināgarī, however the text is continuous in them. ff. 79-94, followed by 24 unnumbered blank folios, then the text continues from ff. 119-269, with 3 blank folios inserted in between.

collation.desc: This unit comprises some folios in Telugu script, uninked. The first written folio after the guard folios is numbered 1 and starts with BhP 1.1. This beginning is repeated in the following folio in Nandināgarī, also numbered 1. After f. 14 in Nandināgarī, where BhP 1.114 starts, a folio in Telugu script is inserted, also carrying the number 14. This is a copy of the folio in Nandināgarī. The Nandināgarī text is interrupted after f. 17 (BhP 1.17.33a), and the text continues in Telugu script with three folios, numbered 18-21 (BhP 2.2.18b). F. 68 in telugu continues the text after f. 67 in Nandināgarī (BhP 4.1.45a), although the same text continues in f. 68 in Nandināgarī.
folios numbered from 1-94 (BhP skandha 1-5.1.4); 24 blank folios, 119-269 (BhP skandha 6.1.18-end of skandha 10); 314-325 (BhP skandha 12)
After the end of skandha 10 on f. 269r, f. 269v contains the beginning of an unidentified text, which is not part of the Bhāgavatapurāṇa.

supportDesc.condition: Good state of preservation, despite some wear around the edges.

listBibl.bibl: Janert, Klaus Ludwig, Poti, N. Narasimhan. 1985. Verzeichnis der orientalischen Handschriften in Deutschland. Band II, 7. Stuttgart: F. Steiner. p. 879.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces between words added where possible.
